reviewText: I only ever had one problem with the dvd's I have gotten from various sellers.  always got them before they were even to be shipped out.  Very pleased.
Mediocre copy from VHS and mostly mediocre films. Duel of Champions with Alan Ladd is not bad. But Rod Taylor is terribly dubbed in the Colossus film. Good bio of Steve Reeves as bonus.
This has to be the worst product on Amazon, Don't even think about buying it. You will be nothing but dissapointed.

ST. CLAIR DVD multi-packs are reasonably priced, and offer fine quality video/audio transfers of unrestored public domain material. Discs are single-side recorded, plastic storage cases fairly sturdy, movie liner notes appear on box's back cover and most DVDs include bonus items. HIGHLIGHTS: THE GIANT OF MARATHON-- A Greek soldier leads the fight against invading Persians during the Medic Wars. GIANTS OF ROME-- Gladiators handpicked by Caesar himself are off on a secret suicide mission against the Druids. THE GIANTS OF THESSALY-- Jason sails the Argo in search of the Golden Fleece (a winged ram). THE REBEL GLADIATORS-- To spare his village from destruction, Ursus must arena fight the mightiest Roman SPARTACUS AND THE TEN GLADIATORS-- Based on ancient lore. The Roman slave revolt begins with an uprising by Spartacus and several fellow slave-gladiators. HISTORY AT THE MOVIES (also from St. Clair) includes another Spartacus film ("Sins of Rome"), plus "Constantine and the Cross," a story of the first Christian emperor. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. DISC ONE-- (5.4) Giants of Rome (Italy/France-1964) - Richard Harrison/Wandisa Guida (5.1) The Rebel Gladiators (Italy-1963) - Dan Vadis/Gloria Milland/José Greci (3.1) Spartacus and the Ten Gladiators (Italy/Spain/France-1964) - Dan Vadis/Helga Liné/Alfredo Varelli/Jeff Cameron BONUS: Sword & Sandal Posters DISC TWO-- (5.0) The Giant of Marathon (Italy/France-1959) - Steve Reeves/Mylène Demongeot (4.8) The Last Glory of Troy (Yugo/Italy/France-1962) - Steve Reeves/Carla Marlier (5.0) The Giants of Thessaly (Italy/France-1961) - Roland Carey/Ziva Rodann/Massimo Girotti BONUS: Steve Reeves Bio DISC THREE-- (4.3) Duel of Champions (Italy-1961) - Robert Keith/Alan Ladd/Alana Ladd/Steve Reeves (3.6) Colossus and the Amazon Queen (Italy-1960) - Rod Taylor/Ed Fury/Dorian Gray (5.8) Gladiators 7 (Spain/Italy-1962) - Richard Harrison/Loredana Nusciak/Livio Lorenzon BONUS: The Glory of Death
